oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Research for organic farming in the Czech Republic in 2010 and vision of organic research for Eastern Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Urban, Jiri
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Contribution for BIONET 2011 Conference - new ideas for organic farming, held in Vienna, 3rd March 2011
- Research into organic agriculture in CZ and the Czech Technology Platform for Organic Agriculture - Reflections on EU policy in terms of targeting organic research - Vision for research, development, innovation and education in Eastern Europe - Proposal for coordination of research and transfer of know-how for OF in Central and Eastern Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Urban, Jiri (2011) Research for organic farming in the Czech Republic in 2010 and vision of organic research for Eastern Europe. [Výzkum pro ekologické zemědělství v roce 2010 v České republice a vize organického výzkumu pro východní Evropu.] Speech at: BIONET 2011 Conference - new ideas for organic farming, Vienna, 3.3.2011. [Completed]
